alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 01 at 8:45PM CDT until April 09 at 2:42AM CDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at Lafayette to Vincennes. .Flooding continues along much of the Wabash River. More precipitation is in the forecast and this will result in prolonged flooding into mid to late next week. Those with interests along area waterways should monitor forecasts for the latest information. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY, APRIL 09... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Riverton. * WHEN...Until Sunday, April 09. * IMPACTS...At 18.5 feet, High water surrounds elevated river cabins. County roads to these cabins are impassable. Agricultural flooding is in progress. Seep water develops behind levees. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Saturday /9:00 PM EDT Saturday/ the stage was 18.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Saturday /9:00 PM EDT Saturday/ was 18.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon and continue falling to 8.6 feet Tuesday, April 11. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
